description: RSS reader compatible with Google Reader API An Android client for RSS services compatible with Google Reader API, such as the open source self-hosted project FreshRSS. Features: * Sync with RSS services compatible with Google Reader API * Image downloading for off-line reading * Simple swipe between starred/all/unread items * Manage starred items * View items by tag or subscription * State saving & syncing * Slide up & down to move between items * Font size adjustment
